collapseAttrs.name: modelValue / v-model
collapseAttrs.desc: Currently activated panel (In accordion mode, the binding value type must be String. Otherwise, the binding value type is array.)

collapseAttrs.name: accordion
collapseAttrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

collapseAttrs.name: before-close
collapseAttrs.desc: Do not close the folding panel.

collapseEvents.name: change
collapseEvents.desc: Triggered when the current active panel changes. (In accordion mode, the type of activeNames is String. Otherwise, the type of activeNames is array.)

collapseItemAttrs.name: disabled
collapseItemAttrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.
